entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:12 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:12 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023
